summary: A station/radio application with on-air display controls, update button, and an about station section for manual updates

existing_features.title: Add a new 'About Station' section to the About page that displays station information with a clear indication that content can be manually updated by administrators
Add an admin page for managing the About Station content with a form to edit title, description, and detailed information
Add React Query hooks for fetching and updating station information
Add navigation link to the Manage Station Info page from the Admin Dashboard

new_feature_requests.summary: Add about station section with manual update capability
Create a backend data type and storage for station information including fields for title, description, and rich text content
Create backend mutation function to update station information with admin authorization
